The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion

wikitext.*:
'''Glip''' is a poem written by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] in his series [[Tales and Songs of Bimble Bay]]. The original poem was reprinted in [[Douglas A. Anderson]]'s ''[[The Annotated Hobbit]]: Revised and Expanded Edition''. Anderson claims that the poem is an antecedent to [[Gollum]].<ref>{{HM|RC}} p. 37</ref><ref>''[[Douglas A. Anderson]] (ed), [[The Annotated Hobbit]]'', 2nd end., p. 119</ref>
